short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Temporarily bypass CORS restrictions to streamline development and testing workflows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CORS Unblock - Simplify Cross-Origin Development and Testing

•	Bypass CORS Restrictions: Enable or disable Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) restrictions with a single click. Simplify testing APIs and web applications without server-side modifications.
•	Temporary Changes: All CORS unblock settings are temporary and reset automatically when the browser is closed, ensuring no lingering security risks.
•	Developer-Friendly Tool: Designed specifically for developers and testers working on local or cross-origin APIs.
•	Security Reminder: Includes a clear warning about the potential security risks of disabling CORS, helping users make informed decisions.
•	Minimalist Design: Features an intuitive, lightweight user interface that allows quick toggling of the unblock feature.
•	Safe and Efficient: Ideal for debugging and testing purposes without affecting live or production environments.
•	No Configuration Required: Start using the extension immediately with zero setup—just install and enable as needed.
•	Support for All URLs: Works across any website or API endpoint, offering a universal solution for cross-origin resource issues.
